org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies

Class VmAllocationPolicyAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.VmAllocationPolicyAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VmAllocationPolicy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract, VmAllocationPolicySimple

    public abstract class VmAllocationPolicyAbstract
extends Object
implements VmAllocationPolicy
    An abstract class that represents the policy used by a Datacenter to choose a Host to place or migrate or migrate a given Vm. It supports two-stage commit of reservation of hosts: first, we reserve the host and, once committed by the user, it is effectively allocated to he/she.

    Each Datacenter has to have its own instance of a class that extends this class.

    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov

      • getVmHostMap

        protected Map<String,Host> getVmHostMap()
        Gets the map between a VM and its allocated host. The map key is a VM UID and the value is the allocated host for that VM.
        Returns:
        the VM map

      • mapVmToPm

        protected void mapVmToPm(Vm vm,
                         Host host)
        Register the allocation of a given Host to a Vm. It maps the placement of the Vm into the given Host.
        Parameters:
        vm - the placed Vm
        host - the Host where the Vm has just been placed

      • unmapVmFromPm

        protected Host unmapVmFromPm(Vm vm)
        Unregister the allocation of a Host to a given Vm, unmapping the Vm to the Host where it was. The method has to be called when a Vm is moved/removed from a Host.
        Parameters:
        vm - the moved/removed Vm
        Returns:
        the Host where the Vm was removed/moved from or Host.NULL if the Vm wasn't associated to a Host
